content: はい
Hi Stephanie! So, what are some of your favorite hobbies or personal interests?
Hello
Hello Stephanie! It's great to chat with you. What hobbies or personal interests do you enjoy?
To be honest, I have many hobbies, but I haven't practiced any one, you know what I mean?
I get that, exploring different things can be exciting! Are there any hobbies you've been wanting to focus on more lately?
Sim, eu quero voltar para o paragliding, para a natureza, sair, conversar. Espero que possa voltar em breve.
Paragliding sounds amazing! What's your favorite part about it? Do you have any plans to start soon?
Yeah, actually it's restarting, you know. I used it before. I hope soon, you know. I haven't worked too much.
That sounds exciting! What do you enjoy most about paragliding? Are you planning any trips to get back to it soon?
The most exciting thing about paragliding is freedom, you know, freedom feeling. Yeah, actually I don't have any plan for now, but I hope the next year is going to be a paragliding year, I hope.
Freedom sounds exhilarating! Do you have a specific location in mind for paragliding next year?

Sim, eu sempre comecei a ir a lugares por aqui, não tão longe, como Atibaia, Pirapora, até até duas horas daqui, Minas Gerais. Talvez eu tenha que explorar novos lugares, onde eu possa encontrar pessoas boas. Eu tenho que encontrar um lugar onde eu me sinta bem, com uma boa amizade.
Exploring new places sounds exciting! Do you have any specific places in mind that you’d like to visit next for paragliding?
Yeah, I said in the last time, Atibaia, maybe Andradas, have you heard about it?
Yes, I've heard about Andradas! It’s supposed to be beautiful. Have you been there before, or would this be your first time exploring it?
Sim, eu já estive lá antes. É um dos meus lugares favoritos para voar. Perto daqui, em São Paulo, tem o Andradas e outro em São Pedro, em Piracicaba. Você conhece aquele?
I haven’t been to São Pedro in Piracicaba. What do you like most about these places for flying?
The view, many landing places, you know, many places to land, beautiful landscaping.
It sounds amazing! Are there any particular spots you recommend for a truly breathtaking view while flying there?
